text: Imre Vígh (3 April 1938 - 23 April 2001) was a Hungarian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle light heavyweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1938 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Hungarian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Hungary Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Székesfehérvár
title: Imre Vígh
